work.description: Performed daily rounds; mentored residents and nurses in appropriate patient communications and treatment protocols. Evaluated and treated cases of head trauma, epileptic seizure, drug overdose, neuropathy, Parkinson’s disease, and multiple sclerosis.

Led discussion sections and graded student essays and exams for large lecture classes in Clinical Neuropsychology, Addiction, Experimental Psychology, Psychological and Behavioral Testing Methods, Psychopharmacology, Memory Assessment, and Sensation and Perception. Milan
Present initiatives, activities to sensitize the general public on the problems related to disability, and to promote inclusion, social engagement, and donations. Milan
